Sentencas: This paper presents analysis of the performance of a combined cooling and power (CCP) system for district cooling.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: The cogeneration system is designed to provide cooling for a low-rise residential district of 27,300 RT (96 MWc).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) generates electric power to operate chillers, and the exhaust fuel and heat from the SOFC run gas turbines and absorption chillers.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: Thermal energy storage is utilized to reduce system capacity.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: Part-load operation strategies target maximizing energy efficiency.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: The operation of the system is compared through an hourly simulation to that of packaged air-conditioning units typically used to cool homes.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: The CCP system with the district cooling arrangement improves the cooling-to-fuel efficiency by 346%.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: The peak power requirement is reduced by 57% (24 MW) and the total fuel energy is reduced by 54% (750 TJ y(-1)).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: The system cuts annual carbon dioxide emissions to less than half and reduces other harmful emissions.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling

Sentencas: A cost analysis of the system components and operation resulted in a 53% reduction in the cost per ton-hour of cooling over traditional systems.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell application in district cooling
